# Bargn

> AI-powered discount membership platform offering 50% off at restaurants, bars, gyms, and spas in Helsinki, Finland.

## About

Bargn is a mobile-first membership app that connects consumers with local businesses through AI-powered personalized 50% discount recommendations. Members pay €8.80/month for unlimited access to deals across Helsinki's restaurants, bars, fitness centers, and spas.

## Core Offerings

- **Consumer Membership**: €8.80/month for unlimited 50% discounts at partner venues
- **Business Partnership**: Zero-commission platform for businesses to attract new customers
- **Creator Program**: 40% revenue share for content creators and influencers

## Pages

- [Home](https://bargn.app/): Main landing page with app overview, features, and pricing
- [Members](https://bargn.app/members): Membership plans and pricing details
- [Partners](https://bargn.app/partners): B2B partnership information for businesses
- [Campaign](https://bargn.app/campaign): Creator and influencer partnership program
- [How It Works](https://bargn.app/how-it-works): Step-by-step guide to using Bargn
- [About](https://bargn.app/about): Company information and mission
- [Blog](https://bargn.app/blog): Articles about savings, deals, and smart spending
- [Privacy Policy](https://bargn.app/privacy): Privacy and data handling policies
- [Terms of Service](https://bargn.app/terms): Terms and conditions
- [Cookie Policy](https://bargn.app/cookies): Cookie usage information

## Key Facts

- **Location**: Helsinki, Finland
- **Languages**: Finnish (fi), English (en)
- **Price**: €8.80/month membership
- **Discount**: 50% off at all partner venues
- **Categories**: Restaurants, Bars & Nightlife, Fitness & Wellness, Beauty & Spa
- **Commission**: Zero commission for partner businesses
- **Creator Revenue Share**: 40%
